Summary: Chat - the creator of a group conversation can't rename it

Steps to reproduce.2: Sign in: login - test3/ password - test123
Steps to reproduce.3: Open a chat dialog with 'Test Testington'
Steps to reproduce.4: Click on the button 'Settings'- add user
Steps to reproduce.5: Add any user to a group conversation - click 'Done'
Steps to reproduce.6: Click again on 'Settings' to rename the group conversation

Expected result: All participants must be able to rename a group conversation
Actual result: 'Rename conversation' is disabled for the creator of the group conversation

Summary: The total price does not reflect the quantity of the item

Steps to reproduce.3: Add any item to the Cart

Expected result: The total price should reflect the quantity of the product
Actual result: Displaying the total price for 1 item only

Summary: Error message appears when navigating to 'Your Account'
Expected result: User should be redirected to Account page
